title: Top 10 causes of infant mortality in Canada in 2018
summary: This is a bar chart representing Cause in the x axis and Number of deaths in the y axis.
The Number of deaths is highest at Cause Congenital malformations deformations and chromosomal abnormalities and lowest at Cause Sudden infant death syndrome.
The highest value at Cause Congenital malformations deformations and chromosomal abnormalities is 41.2x times more than the lowest value at Sudden infant death syndrome.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Cause in the x axis and Number of deaths in the y axis.
Cause Congenital malformations deformations and chromosomal abnormalities has the highest Number of deaths and Sudden infant death syndrome has the lowest Number of deaths.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Cause in the x axis and Number of deaths in the y axis.
The Number of deaths is highest at Cause Congenital malformations deformations and chromosomal abnormalities and lowest at Cause Sudden infant death syndrome.
The highest value at Cause Congenital malformations deformations and chromosomal abnormalities is 41.2x times more than the lowest value at Sudden infant death syndrome.
max_summary: This bar chart has 12 columns on the x axis representing Cause, and Number of deaths in each Cause on the y axis.
The Number of deaths is appeared to be the highest at Cause Congenital malformations deformations and chromosomal abnormalities and lowest at Cause Sudden infant death syndrome.
The second highest Number of deaths is appeared to be the Cause Disorders related to short gestation and low birth weight not elsewhere classified.
The maximum Cause Congenital malformations deformations and chromosomal abnormalities has got 41.2 times higher Number of deaths than the minimum Cause Sudden infant death syndrome.

Number of deaths at Cause Congenital malformations deformations and chromosomal abnormalities is 412.0 , second place is Disorders related to short gestation and low birth weight not elsewhere classified at 171.0, and thirdly is Newborn affected by maternal complications of pregnancy at 167.0.
Cause Accidents (unintentional injuries), and Diseases of the circulatory system have a similar Number of deaths that is 17.0.
The Cause Sudden infant death syndrome tends to be 4.42 percent lower than average.
Summing up the values of all Causes, we get total 1118.0.

data.Cause: Congenital malformations deformations and chromosomal abnormalities
Disorders related to short gestation and low birth weight not elsewhere classified
Newborn affected by maternal complications of pregnancy
Newborn affected by complications of placenta cord and membranes
